name: freshroute-extension
description: Chrome extension to rewrite URLs and modify headers with regex support

scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=development vite build --mode development && NODE_ENV=development node scripts/process-html.js && NODE_ENV=development node scripts/optimize-icons.js && NODE_ENV=development node scripts/dev-manifest.js
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production vite build --mode production && NODE_ENV=production node scripts/process-html.js && NODE_ENV=production node scripts/optimize-icons.js && NODE_ENV=production node scripts/dev-manifest.js
scripts.pack: npm run build:prod && node scripts/pack.js && node scripts/build-summary.js
